titleStmt.title: The royall master as it vvas acted in the nevv Theater in Dublin: and before the Right Honorable the Lord Deputie of Ireland, in the Castle. Written by Iames Shirley.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Cotes, and are to be sold by Iohn Crooke, and Richard Serger, at the Grayhound in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A variant (STC 22454a) has Thomas Allot and Edmond Crooke as booksellers in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
